mapper.update: update oms_order set pay_amount = #{build.payAmount}, trans_id = #{build.transId}, pay_type = #{build.payType}, order_status = #{build.orderStatus}, payment_time = #{build.paymentTime} where order_sn = #{build.orderSn};
update `oms_order` set is_appraise = 0, is_confirm_status = 1, order_status = 3 WHERE order_id = #{orderId};
update `oms_order` set is_appraise = 0, is_confirm_status = 1, order_status = 8 WHERE order_id = #{orderId};
mapper.select: select oo.order_id, ooi.order_id orderId, ooi.order_item_id, oo.user_id, oo.order_sn, oo.pay_type, oo.order_type, oo.receiver_name, oo.receiver_phone, oo.receiver_code, oo.receiver_province, oo.receiver_city, oo.receiver_region, oo.receiver_address, oo.order_note, oo.payment_time, oo.partner_price, ooi.product_pic, ooi.product_price, ooi.is_appraise, ooi.product_id, ooi.product_attr, ooi.product_quantity, ooi.product_name, oo.order_status, oo.total_amount, oo.delivery_company, ooa.kd_name, oo.delivery_sn, oo.`cpy_type`, pvc.`code`, pvc.`is_status` from oms_order oo left join oms_order_item ooi on oo.order_id = ooi.order_id left join sys_kd_code ooa on ooa.kd_code = oo.delivery_company LEFT JOIN `oms_verification_order` ovo ON ovo.`order_id` = #{orderSn} LEFT JOIN `pms_verification_code` pvc ON pvc.`verification_id` = ovo.`verification_id` where oo.order_sn = #{orderSn};

select oo.order_id, oo.user_id, oo.order_sn, oo.total_amount, oo.pay_type, oo.order_status, oo.order_type, oo.cpy_type, oo.`partner_id`, ooi.product_pic, ooi.product_name, ooi.product_quantity, ooi.product_attr , pvc.`is_status`, pvc.`code` from oms_order oo left join oms_order_item ooi on oo.order_id = ooi.order_id LEFT JOIN `oms_verification_order` AS ovo ON ovo.`order_id` = oo.`order_sn` LEFT JOIN `pms_verification_code` AS pvc ON pvc.`verification_id` = ovo.`verification_id` AND pvc.`partner_id` = oo.`partner_id`
oo.order_type = 1 and oo.user_id = #{userId} and oo.cpy_type = #{query.cpyType}
and oo.order_id < #{query.orderId}
and ooi.product_name like CONCAT('%',#{query.keyword},'%')
and
oo.order_status = 0
oo.order_status = 1
oo.order_status = 2
oo.order_status = 3
pvc.`is_status` = 1
oo.is_appraise = 0 and is_confirm_status = 1
order by oo.order_id desc limit #{query.pageSize};

SELECT SUM(total_amount) AS `total_amount`, COUNT(order_id) AS `order_number`, COUNT(order_id) AS `visitors` FROM `oms_order` WHERE `partner_id` = #{partnerId} AND trans_id IS NOT NULL AND DATE_FORMAT(`payment_time`, '%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d')

SELECT oo.`order_id`, oo.`create_time`, oo.`order_status`, ooi.`product_pic`, ooi.`product_name`, oo.`total_amount`, ooi.`product_quantity`, oo.`create_time` FROM `oms_order` oo LEFT JOIN `oms_order_item` ooi ON oo.`order_id` = ooi.`order_id` WHERE oo.`partner_id` = #{partnerId}

select oo.order_id,oo.user_id,oo.total_amount,ooi.product_quantity, ppp.partner_pdt_id,ppp.partner_name,ppp.partner_price,ppp.earnest_money,ppp.total_price, ppp.re_periods from oms_order oo left join oms_order_item ooi on oo.order_id = ooi.order_id left join pms_partner_product ppp on ooi.partner_pdt_id = ppp.partner_pdt_id where oo.order_type = 4 and oo.trans_id > 0 and TO_DAYS( NOW( ) ) - TO_DAYS(oo.payment_time) <= 1 and ppp.is_publish_status = 1;

SELECT user_id, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT buyer_logon_id) pay_list, ROUND(SUM(pay_amount) / 100, 2) sum_consume, MAX(payment_time) latest_payment_time, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN order_type = '0' THEN pay_amount ELSE 0 END) / 100, 2) general_consume, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN order_type = '1' THEN pay_amount ELSE 0 END) / 100, 2) sec_kill_consume, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN order_type = '3' THEN pay_amount ELSE 0 END) / 100, 2) member_consume, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN order_type = '4' THEN pay_amount ELSE 0 END) / 100, 2) maker_consume, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN order_type = '0' AND order_status = '5' THEN pay_amount ELSE 0 END) / 100, 2) refunded, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN order_type = '1' AND order_status = '2' THEN pay_amount ELSE 0 END) / 100, 2) wait_take, 0 not_refund FROM oms_order WHERE trans_id > 0 GROUP BY user_id

SELECT user_id, oo.order_id, ROUND(oo.pay_amount / 100, 2) money, oo.pay_type, oo.order_status, oo.order_type, oo.create_time, oo.payment_time, oo.is_confirm_status confirm_status, oo.trans_id, oo.cpy_type, oo.order_note, ooi.product_name FROM oms_order oo LEFT JOIN oms_order_item ooi ON oo.order_id = ooi.order_id WHERE oo.user_id = #{userId}
